nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't it be Twitter twitter = new TwitterFactory(builder.build()).getInstance(); ?
Of course! You're right. I added this line in a previous commit but I rebased on an older commit and forgot to add this 😅
@NathanStrobbe this could be even shortned to one line:  Twitter twitter = new TwitterFactory(new ConfigurationBuilder().setIncludeEmailEnabled(true).build()).getInstance();
